thread.section_title: zChocolat Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of zChocolat | www.zchocolat.com | 4 of 19
thread.title: Hillary Donohoe

author: Hillary Donohoe
title: Hillary Donohoe
text: The ordering process is easy and the product is always even better than I remembered from the last time. The chocolates are extremely good quality, taste amazing and come in very carefully presented packaging. The order is always shipped straight away and the tracking information allows the customer to see exactly where the order is. I have always received the orders on exactly the day I request.
